sentences: Thomas Clausen (born 5 October 1949) is a Danish jazz pianist and composer.
Clausen was born on 5 October 1949 in Copenhagen.
Clausen was part of the band V8, led by Palle Mikkelborg and Alex Riel, from 1970 to 1975.
He has recorded with Scandinavian jazz musicians and with Bob Brookmeyer, Eddie "Lockjaw" Davis, Dexter Gordon, Jackie McLean, Ben Webster and others.
He has also led groups throughout his career.
Swingin' Till the Girls Come Home (SteepleChase, 1976)With Miles Davis
Ode to Super (SteepleChase, 1973) with Gary Bartz
